trans-unit.source: My job here is done, now its time to do yours!
trans-unit.target: My job here is done, now its time to do yours!

trans-unit.source: Shiftv have a lot of features and it's quite big, you will learn how to use it, using it not with a big tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Shiftv have a lot of features and it's quite big, you will learn how to use it, using it not with a big tutorial.

trans-unit.source: I hope you like shiftv and becomes your app number one!
trans-unit.target: I hope you like shiftv and becomes your app number one!

trans-unit.source: You will see me back, sometimes i'm randomly summoned.
trans-unit.target: You will see me back, sometimes i'm randomly summoned.

trans-unit.source: You will see in different pages of the app buttons to get more options and interact with tv shows or movies
trans-unit.target: You will see in different pages of the app buttons to get more options and interact with tv shows or movies

trans-unit.source: Indicates that have a navigation menu on top, or a options menu on bottom.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that have a navigation menu on top, or a options menu on bottom.

trans-unit.source: Add TV show or movie to your watchlist.
trans-unit.target: Add TV show or movie to your watchlist.

trans-unit.source: Set one episode or movie as seen.
trans-unit.target: Set one episode or movie as seen.

trans-unit.source: Check in to an episode or movie, will be tagged as seen after seeing one episode or movie.
trans-unit.target: Check in to an episode or movie, will be tagged as seen at the end of the stream.

trans-unit.source: Love or Hate episodes, tv shows and movies.
trans-unit.target: Love or Hate episodes, tv shows and movies.

trans-unit.source: On TV shows you have a lot of pages, most of them are lists of tv shows with different context like
trans-unit.target: On TV shows you have a lot of pages, most of them are lists of tv shows with different context like

trans-unit.source: but you have some pages related to your account, like:
trans-unit.target: but you have some pages related to your account, like:

trans-unit.source: calendar with respective episodes of your watchlisted TV Shows.
trans-unit.target: calendar with respective episodes of your watchlisted TV Shows.

trans-unit.source: page with all your watchlisted TV shows and episodes left to see, global statistics and random episode from your watchlist.
trans-unit.target: page with all your watchlisted TV shows and episodes left to see, global statistics and random episode from your watchlist.

trans-unit.source: I will help you to understand how shiftv works, since is your first time using it, just swipe or click next to start the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: I will help you to understand how shiftv works, since is your first time using it, just swipe or click next to start the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You can always quit clicking X on this page.
trans-unit.target: You can always quit clicking X on this page.

trans-unit.source: Shiftv needs to have connection to the servers at least the first time that you try to login on this machine, so we sorry for this inconvinence but try again later or go by now with guest login
trans-unit.target: Shiftv needs to have connection to the servers at least the first time that you try to login on this machine, so we sorry for this inconvinence but try again later or go by now with guest login

trans-unit.source: I already review shiftv on store and don't ask me again
trans-unit.target: I already review shiftv on store and don't ask me again

trans-unit.source: do you loved to use shiftv until now? so do not forget to make a review in the store and follow the shiftv on social networks!
trans-unit.target: do you loved to use shiftv until now? so do not forget to make a review in the store and follow the shiftv on social networks!

trans-unit.source: liked to see this movie or episode? so do not forget to make a review in the store and follow the shiftv on social networks!
trans-unit.target: liked to see this movie or episode? so do not forget to make a review in the store and follow the shiftv on social networks!

trans-unit.source: Release date less than a month ago
trans-unit.target: Release date less than a month ago

trans-unit.source: This movie was released less than a month ago, so probably you will not get a stream or get a CAM stream with bad quality, do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: This movie was released less than a month ago, so probably you will not get a stream or get a CAM stream with bad quality, do you want to continue?

trans-unit.source: remove ads and help shiftv get new servers *
trans-unit.target: remove ads and become a silver partner of shiftv *

trans-unit.source: remove ads and become a main supporter of shiftv **
trans-unit.target: remove ads and become a gold partner of shiftv **

trans-unit.source: * helper badge on the app (to apply the badge to your account you need to be logged)
trans-unit.target: * helper badge on the app (to apply the badge to your account you need to be logged)

trans-unit.source: ** badge on the app and t-shirt (will require your email address and to apply the badge to your account you need to be logged)
trans-unit.target: ** badge on the app and t-shirt (will require your email address and to apply the badge to your account you need to be logged)

trans-unit.source: do you want to remove ads? pick one of the packs!
trans-unit.target: do you want to remove ads? pick one of the packs! (this will help shiftv to get new servers!)

trans-unit.source: please insert a valid email address
trans-unit.target: please insert a valid email address

trans-unit.source: can you fill your email and we will contact you in less than 48 hours to get more info to send the t-shirt! Thanks hero!
trans-unit.target: can you fill your email and we will contact you in less than 48 hours to get more info to send the t-shirt! Thanks hero!

trans-unit.source: you already have purchased this pack, some problem? send email to: shiftv@gmail.com
trans-unit.target: you already have purchased this pack, some problem? send email to: shiftv@outlook.com

trans-unit.source: sorry :( something went wrong on the purchase please, try again later
trans-unit.target: sorry :( something went wrong on the purchase please, try again later

trans-unit.source: thanks! now you will not see ads on shiftv anymore, enjoy!
trans-unit.target: thanks! now you will not see ads on shiftv anymore, enjoy!

trans-unit.source: thanks a lot, ads just dissapear, and you become a silver contributer. Congrats!
trans-unit.target: thanks a lot, ads just dissapear, and you become a silver contributer. Congrats!

trans-unit.source: thanks a lot, ads just dissapear, and you become a gold contributer. Congrats!
trans-unit.target: thanks a lot, ads just dissapear, and you become a gold contributer. Congrats!

trans-unit.source: one click per day can make the difference :)
trans-unit.target: one click per day can make the difference :)

trans-unit.source: you can add your favorite tv shows to your dashboard adding them to watchlist
trans-unit.target: you can add your favorite tv shows to your dashboard adding them to watchlist

trans-unit.source: sorry but you don't have any show watchlisted and not even an episode as seen
trans-unit.target: sorry but you don't have any show watchlisted and not even an episode as seen

trans-unit.source: set this %%amp; all previous as seen
trans-unit.target: set this %%amp; all previous as seen

trans-unit.source: subtitles are disabled, if you want to use subtitles choose the languages on app settings panel
trans-unit.target: subtitles are disabled, if you want to use subtitles choose the languages on app settings panel

trans-unit.source: shiftv can not check in now because you are already checked in to another episode or movie, do you want to cancel the old check in and check in to this one? or you can just say NO and checkin later
trans-unit.target: shiftv can not check in now because you are already checked in to another episode or movie, do you want to cancel the old check in and check in to this one? or you can just say NO and checkin later

trans-unit.source: no activities yet, try to add some friends!
trans-unit.target: no activities yet, try to add some friends!

trans-unit.source: is lonely here, this user doesn't love movies
trans-unit.target: it's lonely here, this user doesn't have any loved movies

trans-unit.source: is lonely here, this user doesn't love shows
trans-unit.target: is lonely here, this user doesn't have any loved shows

trans-unit.source: is lonely here, this user don't do anything
trans-unit.target: is lonely here, this user doesn't have activities

trans-unit.target: can't login please check your connection

trans-unit.source: shiftv dont found any subtitles for this yet, sorry.
trans-unit.target: shiftv coudn't find any subtitles for this yet, sorry.

trans-unit.source: Processing subtitles, the CC button will be enabled after finish this process
trans-unit.target: Processing subtitles, the CC button will be enabled once the processing finishes

trans-unit.source: try to use more this app and the info will appear
trans-unit.target: try to use more this app and the info will appear

trans-unit.source: sorry but shiftv don't have anything to show to you here
trans-unit.target: sorry but shiftv doesn't have anything to show here

trans-unit.source: no activities yet, add some friends!
trans-unit.target: no activities yet, add some friends!
trans-unit.note: Apaga este recurso, repetido com o numero 7

trans-unit.source: this is not for guests, please sign in
trans-unit.target: this is not available for guests, please sign in

trans-unit.source: no files in the queue at the moment
trans-unit.target: no files in the queue at the moment

trans-unit.source: shiftv detect a problem on your connection
trans-unit.target: shiftv has detected a problem with your connection

trans-unit.source: please check your connection and try again
trans-unit.target: please check your connection and try again

trans-unit.source: shiftv is having a bad time with servers
trans-unit.target: shiftv is having a bad time connecting with the servers

trans-unit.source: hopefully will be fast, please come back ASAP
trans-unit.target: you can experience some limitations, hopefully will be ok soon
trans-unit.note: Nao sei bem o que queres aqui. Temos de falar.

trans-unit.source: please login with your trakt account or create a new account free!
trans-unit.target: please login with your trakt account or create a new free account!

trans-unit.source: no comments here yet, join the community, be the first!
trans-unit.target: no comments here yet, join the community, be the first!

trans-unit.target: no age? who is this guy?

trans-unit.target: can't set as seen right now, please try again later, sorry.

trans-unit.target: can't rate right now, please try again later, sorry.

trans-unit.target: shiftv can't get data about this show now, please check your connection or try again

trans-unit.target: can't checkin right now, please try again later, sorry.

trans-unit.target: can'ot add to your watchlist right now, please try again later, sorry.
